basepairLengthToBeSequencedHelp.title: Read Length to be Sequenced
basepairLengthToBeSequencedHelp.content: Here you need to type in the read length of your desired sequencing products in [bp].

sequencingYieldHelp.title: Sequencing Yield of Illumina machine
sequencingYieldHelp.content: Please provide the amount of sequence data per lane in [Mbp].

popStructNumberOfSnps.title: Number of SNPs to be sequenced
popStructNumberOfSnps.content: Which amount of SNPs are you at least aiming to receive?

popStructPopSnpDensity.title: Expected SNP-Polymorphism of population
popStructPopSnpDensity.content: Each population has an individual rate of of SNP mutations. In this field the (estimated) rate of SNP-Mutation is requested in [mutation/kbp].

genomeScanPopSnpDensity.title: Expected SNP-Polymorphism of population
genomeScanPopSnpDensity.content: Each population has an individual rate of of SNP mutations. In this field the (estimated) rate of SNP-Mutation is requested in [mutation/kbp].

basepairsSequencedHelp.title: No. basepairs sequenced in the lane
basepairsSequencedHelp.content: In this column the total amount of base pairs produced by all sample multiplexed in the lane in [bp].

adapterContaminationHelp.title: Adapter Contamination
adapterContaminationHelp.content: Number of fragments below the given length read length of your desired sequencing products are considered as Adapter Contamination.

overlapHelp.title: Overlaps
overlapHelp.content: If paired end sequencing is chosen then fragments have the chance to result in an overlap, which is also considered as contamination. Overlaps occur within fragments with the desired read lengths and and twice their size.

tryOutRestrictionHelp.title: Restriction Enzyme
tryOutRestrictionHelp.content: Here you can choose between various Restriction Enzymes. Just pick two different Restriction Enzymes in each row to perform the analysis on the given fasta-file.
